content.p: Masters loan provided by the UK government A Postgraduate Master's Loan can help with course fees and living costs while you study. The loan amount is not based on you or your family's income. It will be paid directly to you. Whether you qualify depends on: Full eligibility criteria can be found on the GOV.UK website. Funding for postgraduate loans is different if you normally live in Scotland, Wales or Northern Ireland. Students from the EU, EEA and Switzerland who are resident in the UK with 'settled' or 'pre-settled' status under the EU Settlement Scheme may qualify for a UK masters loan. Loans are not available for other international students. Applications are made online through Student Finance England. Find out how to apply though the GOV.UK website. Offered by UK government If you have any questions, contact Student Finance England.
